page.title: 16CHILDREN'S GAMES.
page.content: { High,Low,Dolly,Pepper.}As you skip, the people turn the rope faster saying:"High,low, dolly,pepper".If you stop on high the rope is raised,on low you crouch down,on dolly you turn round & suck your thumb,on pepper skip fast. { Kiss,cuddle & torture.}When caught, the captured chooses to be kissed, cuddled or tortured. { High Dell.}If chased,get on something high to avoid being caught. If not off in 10-15 secs.you become catcher. { All in together.}Every-one skips in together at the beginning,&:"When I count to 20 the rope must be empty." Then:"When I count to 10 the rope must be full again."And every-one jumps in. { Cockle Shells.}The rope does a half turn.Everyone skips while people sing, "Sea shells,cockle shells,evey,ivy, over."
